thread.title: REPORT: Gretchen Carlson Considering a Move to Join MSNBC
thread.title_full: REPORT: Gretchen Carlson Considering a Move to Join MSNBC

author: Ken Meyer
title: REPORT: Gretchen Carlson Considering a Move to Join MSNBC
text:
REPORT: Gretchen Carlson Considering a Move to Join MSNBC by Ken Meyer | 8:27 pm, February 25th, 2017 
Gretchen Carlson may be the next former Fox News anchor who will become part of NBC’s news media empire. 
Business Insider reported that multiple sources have indicated that Carlson is thinking about becoming the latest addition to MSNBC. Although Carlson’s representative have not offered a response, the report asserts that word has come from multiple sources involved with Carlson’s talks with the network, as well as her settlement with Fox News. 
Back in 2016, Carlson left Fox News and filed a sexual harassment lawsuit against former network chief Roger Ailes . Ailes was forced out over the scandal, and since then, Greta Van Susteren and Megyn Kelly both left their own positions at Fox and are now working for NBC. 
[Image via screengrab]
